caption.title: Open the door to Sichuan flavor
caption.content: Check out my collection of super authentic Sichuan recipes.

caption.title: Level up your Sichuan cooking
caption.content: Learn to cook delicious food on our cooking course.

caption.title: Welcome to my blog
caption.content: I unlock Sichuan cuisine secrets and share my passition for Sichuan cusine.

home-section1.title: Come to Sichuan cooking class!
home-section1.p1: Do you love to cook and would you like to become even better at it? Or are you perhaps looking for a different, fun, and not least tasty activity that you can do with your friends, family, or colleagues? Then you should attend the Sichuan cooking class at Emma's Kitchen!
home-section1.p2: In our premises in the heart of Copenhagen, we offer a cooking course with a focus on food culture, useful tips and tricks, and great culinary experiences. We are located very close to a metro station, and with good options for public transport, you can easily get here if you come from a bit outside the city, for example Lyngby or Herlev.
home-section1.p3: Come to our Sichuan cooking class and let yourself be inspired by our cooking universe!

home-section2.title: Private Dining
home-section2.p1: Get a unique and intimate dining experience with our private dining concept, where chef Emma will prepare and serve a tailor-made menu for you.
home-section2.p2: With a kitchen centrally located in Copenhagen, we hold private dining parties for customers who come from the entire area around the capital, including Lyngby and Herlev. We specialize in Sichuan cooking, which mostly focuses on amplifying the vibrant flavors and tantalizing sensory profiles of each individual ingredient. From fiery chili peppers to numbing Sichuan peppercorns, our dishes dance with complexity and leave an indelible impression on your taste buds. You can therefore look forward to an evening with a focus on both fantastic food and great company.

home-section3.title: About me
home-section3.p1: Hey there, I am Emma, a passionate food lover from Sichuan, China, which is known for its delicious and spicy cuisine!
home-section3.p2: Growing up in Sichuan, I was surrounded by all kinds of tasty food. I found it difficult to find the authentic Sichuan flavour from restaurants while living abroad, so I decided to create my own kitchen to recreate the authentic taste. I are on a mission to introduce the amazing Sichuan cuisine to as many people as possible. In Emma’s Kitchen, I will share every key step to get the most authentic flavour with you.

cookingClass-section1.title: Come on a cooking course in Emma's Kitchen
cookingClass-section1.p1: Are you getting tired of always returning to the same old, boring dishes when you have to cook dinner? Would you like to develop your skills in the kitchen, learn about the qualities of different ingredients and become better at letting yourself be inspired? In Emma's Kitchen, you can attend a cooking course where you can learn all this and much more!
cookingClass-section1.p2: Learn to cook with either friends, colleagues or family in our cozy premises, located in the middle of Copenhagen. We arrange a cooking course according to your personal needs, and we welcome visitors who want to expand their culinary horizons from a larger area, including Herlev and Lyngby. See our selection of food courses here

cookingClass-section2.title: Get a basic understanding and good craftsmanship
cookingClass-section2.p1: When you come to a cooking course at our cooking school , we don't just want to hand over a recipe and just let you follow it to the letter. Instead, we want to give you a basic understanding of the Italian traditions and equip you with good craftsmanship that brings out the best taste experience.
cookingClass-section2.p2: During your day on our cooking course, you will, among other things:
cookingClass-section2.p3: You will then be sent home with new food knowledge, inspiring recipes and an experience you will never forget!
cookingClass-section2.li2: ​be introduced to the dishes we will make with fresh ingredients of the best quality
cookingClass-section2.li3: ​learn to enhance the taste experience with our expert guidance
cookingClass-section2.li4: and of course we round off by eating all the delicious food and enjoying the good company

privateDining-section1.title: Have a fantastic meal with a private chef
privateDining-section1.p1: If you’re seeking a unique, enjoyable, and delicious experience to share with friends, family, or colleagues, our private dining events are the perfect choice. Located in the heart of Copenhagen, our venue offers a culinary journey focused on food culture, practical tips, and delightful flavors. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or simply enjoying quality time with loved ones, our warm and comfortable dining environment awaits you. Here you get a fantastic dinner, which is prepared together with your own private chef.
privateDining-section1.p2: At Emma’s Kitchen, you’ll savor unforgettable dishes, create lasting memories, and indulge your taste buds. Join us for an exceptional dining experience that combines exquisite cuisine with a cozy ambiance.

privateDining-section2.title: Private dining for festive events
privateDining-section2.p1: In Emma's Kitchen, we invite our guests into the kitchen, where we teach and talk about the proud Italian food traditions. Here you are not just served a delicious meal – you get the opportunity to prepare it yourself and develop your culinary skills. It is also an entertaining and pleasant activity where you and your guests get to know each other and have fun together.
privateDining-section2.p2: Our private dining experience is therefore quite obvious if you have to organize a party, a company event or another special occasion that is something out of the ordinary.
privateDining-section2.p3: We can also offer to hold brunch, lunch and dinner parties - each with 3 starters, 3 main courses and 3 desserts, made together. You will therefore have the opportunity to try a large selection of the different recipes that we have carefully developed over the years. We also offer food courses & Gastronomic team building.

aboutMe.p1: Sichuan cuisine is one of the most popular and diverse cuisines in China and the world. The dishes of Sichuan cuisine are known for their deep and rich flavours, especially the taste of Sichuan pepper which is rare in other regional cuisines. Sichuan cuisine holds a reputation for its variety of seasonings used, as each dish requires different cooking methods. In Emma’s Kitchen, I will show you how to cook with different cooking methods include frying, steaming, braising and the most popular of which is stir-frying.
aboutMe.p2: Emma’s Kitchen is the perfect destination for food lovers who want to experience the authentic taste of Sichuan cuisine. You will have the opportunity to try some of the most famous Sichuan dishes, such as Mapo Tofu, Kung Pao Chicken, and Chili Chicken. In addition, you will also get to taste many of the family daily dishes such as Double Cooked Pork Belly, Scrambled Eggs with Tomato, and Stir-fried Green Veggies. Emma’s Kitchen is a real food trip to Sichuan, where you can indulge in the rich and deep flavours of Sichuan cuisine.

contact.title: Emma's Kitchen
contact.p1: If you have any questions about our events, courses or opening hours, you are always welcome to contact us below.
contact.p2: We are looking forward to hear from you.

testimonials.title: Testimonial 1
testimonials.content: The feedback I have received has all been very positive, that it was a super good event, that it was fun to cook with the colleagues, that the food was good and that you were phenomenal at keeping an overview in an occasionally rather hectic kitchen. several members who have already expressed their desire for us to do a new cooking event for next year.
testimonials.author: Emma
